sections.purpose: To provide dry heat for sterilization of glassware and drying of chemical reagents.
sections.scope: Applicable to laboratory activities in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Check that the oven is clean and the shelves are properly positioned.
Power ON the unit and set the required temperature on the controller.
Allow the oven to reach the set temperature and stabilize.
Place items on the trays, ensuring they do not touch the interior walls.
Close the door tightly to maintain the temperature.
Monitor the temperature periodically during the process.
After the cycle is complete, turn OFF the heater and allow cooling.
Record the temperature and time in the logbook.
precautions: Do not place flammable or explosive materials in the oven.
Avoid overloading the shelves to ensure uniform air circulation.
Do not use the oven for drying heat-sensitive plastics.
Regularly check the door gasket for proper sealing.
